description.value:
Trigger Noph or another creature arms the trap by pressing a sigil on the console

Effect A barrier of force forms from floor to ceiling surrounding the reception desk. The DC to counteract this barrier with @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Dispel Magic] is 43. The trap then rolls initiative.

details.description: The room floods with harmful effects by pressing a magic sigil on a console. Each sigil causes different results. There are six sigils on the console.
details.disable: @Check[type:arcana|dc:40] (master) to disenchant each sigil (can be done from either side of the reception desk), @Check[type:thievery|dc:43] (master) twice to disable the console (can only be done while behind the reception desk), or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Dispel Magic] (8th level; counteract DC 40) to counteract each sigil; prevent Noph from pressing the buttons by gaining access to the reception desk or other methods
details.routine:
(2 actions) Noph frantically pecks and stomps on the console, using each action to press a random sigil. Roll [[/r 1d6 #Pressed Sigil]] to determine which sigil Noph presses. Psychopomps are immune to the effects of these sigils.

1 The area is flooded with holy light, dealing [[/r (3d12+19)[vitality]] damage to each creature in the area (@Check[type:reflex|dc:43|basic:true]).

2 The area is flooded with unholy darkness, dealing @Damage[(3d12+19)[void]] damage to each creature in the area (@Check[type:reflex|dc:43|basic:true]).

3 The area is flooded with blue flames, dealing @Damage[(3d10+19)[fire]] damage to each creature in the area (@Check[type:reflex|dc:43|basic:true]). On a critical failure, a creature additionally takes @Damage[1d10[persistent,fire]] damage.

4 A comet streaks through the area, attacking the nearest creature to Noph with a comet Strike.

5 Force tethers sprout from the floor, grasping at intruders. Each creature in the area is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Immobilized] for 1 round unless they succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:43] save.

6 Ghostly blue mist surrounds each psychopomp in the area, healing them @Damage[(3d8+19)[healing]]]{3d8+19} HP and granting them @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Concealed]{Concealement} for 1 round.
